post.body: Advantages?
Same here. If I get through this year and I'm still self-employed, I'll be chuffed.
Congrats!
All good here.
Capricorns rule. Happy birthday.
Makes sense to me NOT to have a mobile version of a site in Flash. Nothing to stop you serving h.264 QT through HTML though.
It's had a 'coming sometime' status for ages. Apple just don't wan't it. http://tinyurl.com/6nkd85
Might be sooner actually. Working on a site that needs to be iPhone friendly.
Congrats. At least a month or two before mine arrives.
Hope I'm not too late. Happy birthday.
Having our first child has been the big one this year. Staying married & self-employed for another year rates highly too.
is agonising over a logo redesign. 50 versions and none work. Toughest client in the world is yourself.
I recall seeing a woman on the train with her new Nokia and the 200 page user guide open in front of her. There's something wrong with that.
It seems welovetxp.com does judge the sites submitted to it.
...on the track in a purely instructional way that is.
has xmas wishes for the new Nissan GT-R I saw on Top Gear lst night, a neck brace, tyres, fuel and a week at the Nurburgring with Schumacher
Environment be screwed. It's only when they're in the financial shit that they start making fuel efficient cars. http://tinyurl.com/9nxwo8
I'm glad I don't live in the UK because I'm a Coopers nut. http://tinyurl.com/4nvc4l
Warm night, threatening clouds, a Pale Ale in hand awaiting the crispy delights of a spinach & ricotta pastry from Mrs StillMoving. Mmmm.
Fanning down my MBP like I'm some kind of manservant at a colonial resort. YOU work for ME biatch!
